    		Media Production Services
    	The Media Production team collaborates with campus partners to produce high quality videos that highlight and promote the amazing stories and events happening at Chico State.Explore Our WorkWe have the capability to create a wide range of videos, including scripted promotional videos, documentary style stories, tutorials, and live event coverage utilizing our state of the art multiple camera production system.We help take your vision and make it a reality, offering professional guidance and support every step of the way.Our ServicesCreative consultationScriptwritingStudio FilmingLocation FilmingAudio recordingPost Production (Editing and Delivery)Aerial Imaging (Drone photo/video): FAA-certified UAS remote pilot.Multiple camera production for Livestream and Interactive WebinarsFeatured Video PlaylistsDiscover how we can make your event or program shine by watching some of our curated video playlists.StoriesStories about the amazing people and programs at Chico State.Student LifeExperience the events and activities that make Chico State a one of a kind experience.Resources and InformationLearn about Chico State and the many resources we have to offer.AcademicsSee what our amazing academic programs have to offer, and experience presentations from our world class faculty.Information TechnologyKendall Hall, 109www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeYou might be looking for...Classroom Technology ServicesStudent Print CenterGraphic DesignMedia ProductionsPhotographyPrint ServicesPresentation and Environmental GraphicsWeb ServicesInformation Technology
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
